articles.title: IND vs SA LIVE Score, T20 World Cup 2024 Final:Rohit Sharma's Team India Wins T20 WC After 17 Years - NDTV Sports
articles.description: T20 World Cup 2024 Final, IND vs SA Highlights: India edged past South Africa by 7 runs in the final match to clinch an ICC title after 11 years.
articles.content: T20 World Cup 2024 Final Highlights: India edged past South Africa by 7 runs in the final match of T20 World Cup 2024 at Kensington Oval, Barbados on Saturday to clinch an ICC title after 11 years. V… [+1223 chars]
